sys_update_xml.name: syntax_editor_macro_446fee8edb6017405dbe38f0ad961955
sys_update_xml.payload:
<record_update table="syntax_editor_macro"><syntax_editor_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><comments>GlideAjax</comments><name>vargax</name><sys_class_name>syntax_editor_macro</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>fred.luddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-03-01 12:52:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>446fee8edb6017405dbe38f0ad961955</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>vargax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>syntax_editor_macro_446fee8edb6017405dbe38f0ad961955</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>fred.luddy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-01 13:07:08</sys_updated_on><text>//Glide Ajax template : new GlideAjax object referencing name of AJAX script include 
var ga = new GlideAjax('$0');
//sysparm_name is the first function in the AJAX script include
ga.addParam('sysparm_name', '');

ga.getXML(handleResponse);
 
function handleResponse(response) {
  var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
  alert(answer);
 }
</text></syntax_editor_macro></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<record_update table="syntax_editor_macro"><syntax_editor_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><comments/><name>cp_getRef</name><sys_class_name>syntax_editor_macro</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-03-01 12:53:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>695e2642db241740497856f3ce96194a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cp_getRef</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>syntax_editor_macro_695e2642db241740497856f3ce96194a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brent.llewellyn</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-01 12:53:09</sys_updated_on><text>// get Reference from reference_field
g_form.getReference(reference_field, function(ref) {
	// ref contains the GlideRecord object from the reference_field 
	if(ref.<Field on ref>){
		// do something with ref
	} else {

	}
});</text></syntax_editor_macro></record_update>
